capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've heard that Filch is a male character in the Harry Potter series. That's confirmed by many fans and sources, including J.K. Rowling herself. He's definitely not someone you'd want to mess with at Hogwarts!

You know, I've heard that the character of Filch in Harry Potter is often portrayed as a bit of a grump. He's always complaining about something and seems to take great pleasure in making life difficult for the students at Hogwarts. I think he's just trying to cover up his own vulnerabilities with his strict demeanor.
